Detailed Description

This class represents an animation from a SuperModel perspective.

Note:
This is a variable-length class, so don't try to make these at home, kids.

Member Function Documentation

ModelAnimation * SuperModelAnimation::pSource ( SuperModel &  superModel  )  const

This method returns the given animation, for the top lod of the first model it exists in.

Returns:
the animation, or NULL if none exists

void SuperModelAnimation::tick ( SuperModel &  superModel,
float  dtime 
)

This method ticks the animations represented by this class in the input supermodel.

It must be the same as it was created with. Only the top model's animations are ticked. This is a helper method, since ticks are discouraged in SuperModel code.
